thread.title: Jacqueline Fraziers New Book Where Love Abounds: The Separation of Two Brothers is a Touching and Inspirational Tale

author: cbs8
title: Jacqueline Fraziers New Book Where Love Abounds: The Separation of Two Brothers is a Touching and Inspirational Tale
text:
Recent release “Where Love Abounds: The Separation of Two Brothers” from Page Publishing author Jacqueline Frazier is an evocative story of familial bonds, which stand the tests of tragedy.
(PRWEB) October 14, 2015
Jacqueline Frazier, writer and author, has completed her first book, “Where Love Abounds: The Separation of Two Brothers”: a gripping and potent story of brotherly love.
When asked about her inspiration for the book, Frazier stated, “My inspiration was the fact that there are so many people separated from their family. I started to think about those people that have to leave their family members behind; what are they thinking about, what are they feeling - and some of them don’t see each other for so many years. That’s when I started writing this book.”
Published by New York City-based Page Publishing, Jacqueline Frazier’s poignant tale illustrates the power of family to persevere through even the darkest of times. Readers are sure to be touched by this heartwarming work.
We all make choices in life, whether they are good or bad. We need to know that we are loved. A mother had to make a decision, even though it broke her heart, to fulfill a promise.
Readers who wish to experience this potent work can purchase “Where Love Abounds: The Separation of Two Brothers” at bookstores everywhere, or online at the Apple iTunes store, Amazon, Google Play or Barnes and Noble.
For additional information or media inquiries, contact Page Publishing at 866-315-2708.
About Page Publishing
Page Publishing is a traditional New York based full-service publishing house that handles all of the intricacies involved in publishing its authors’ books, including distribution in the world’s largest retail outlets and royalty generation. Page Publishing knows that authors need to be free to create - not bogged down with complicated business issues like eBook conversion, establishing wholesale accounts, insurance, shipping, taxes and the like. Its roster of authors can leave behind these tedious, complex and time consuming issues, and focus on their passion: writing and creating. Learn more at http://www.pagepublishing.com .
